reviewText: As a United fan, of course I was disappointed with the trophyless season, not to also mention the lack of goals scored.  I guess that is why there wasn't so many great "highlights" this past season.  But I bought this DVD anyway.  There is a lot of focus on Wayne Rooney, but I didn't find his press conference to be that interesting as a special feature.  Let's hope United do well next year so that there will be alot more highlights to the season.
